item.description:
Super rare, barrel aged Harpoon beer, half price (really good) food, and free Harpoon Glassware. I'm so there! More details below:

 

Harpoon is kicking off The Lobster Shanty's seasonal opening with a one-off beer - the Cab-beret, a beer that started life in Harpoon's Homebrew system as the Black Beret, then aged in a Cabernet barrel. IPA-like hoppiness, stout-like creamy, chocolately, espresso flavors, and who knows what from it's time in the barrel! I'm super excited to try (what I believe to be) the only barrel of this in existence.

The Lobster Shanty was featured on The Food Network's Diners, Drive-ins, and Dives., and will be offering half-price on any new foods on the menu, AND a free Harpoon Pint Glass. To get the deal you either have to be a Friends of Harpoon member, or just check-in on Facebook via the QR code once you're there. Easy peasy.

You can find me with the Harpoon Rep, and I'll be wearing a back and white houndstooth hat! Check the RSVP list for the pictures of other folks attending to help us find each other.

 

P.S. Since it's in Salem, if people want to carpool, comment below!
item.name: Rare Barrel Aged Harpoon Beer at Lobster Shanty Opening
